short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Solve the most commonly used shortcuts conflict caused by OpenSumi IDE and the Chrome browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The shortcuts of the OpenSumi IDE conflict with those of the Chrome, which makes the corresponding actions of OpenSumi IDE unable to take effect. For example, the Ctrl/Cmd + W shortcut will close the current browser tab, making OpenSumi unable to handle this shortcut event. Web App is an important capability of OpenSumi. If the common shortcuts cannot be used, it will greatly affect the experience of the applications produced on the OpenSumi framework. Therefore, we need to give users shortcuts experience on the web that do not lag behind the local IDE. Shortcuts Guard can solve the conflict of the most used shortcuts.
